analyzed: sādhanam dūṣaṇam ca eva sa ābhāsam para saṃvide

original: pratyakṣam anumānaṃ ca sābhāsaṃ tv ātmasaṃvide //
analyzed: pratyakṣam anumānam ca sa ābhāsam tu ātma saṃvide
iti śāstra artha saṃgrahaḥ
vādinā svayam sādhayitum iṣṭaḥ rthaḥ sādhyaḥ
sādhyate yena tat sādhanam
hetoḥ tri rūpa vacanam
kāni punar tāni triṇi rūpāṇi
pakṣe sattvam eva iti ekam rūpam

original: sapakṣa eva sattvam iti dvitīyaṃ rūpam /
analyzed: sapakṣaḥ eva sattvam iti dvitīyam rūpam

original: vipakṣe cāsattvam eva niścitam iti tṛtīyam //
analyzed: vipakṣe ca asattvam eva niścitam iti tṛtīyam

original: 4. tatra pakṣaḥ prasiddho dharmī prasiddheṇa viśeṣeṇa viśiṣṭaḥ svayaṃ sādhayitum iṣṭaḥ pratyakṣādyaviruddhaḥ /
analyzed: tatra pakṣaḥ prasiddhaḥ dharmī prasiddheṇa viśeṣeṇa viśiṣṭaḥ svayam sādhayitum iṣṭaḥ pratyakṣa ādi aviruddhaḥ

original: yathā śabdo dharmī anityatvena viśeṇa viśiṣtaḥ sādhyate kṛtakatvād iti hetuḥ //
analyzed: yathā śabdaḥ dharmī anitya tvena viśeṇa viśiṣtaḥ sādhyate kṛtaka tvāt iti hetuḥ
kaḥ sapakṣaḥ

original: sādhyadharmeṇa sāmānyena samānaḥ sapakṣo yathā ghaṭādir iti //
analyzed: sādhya dharmeṇa sāmānyena samānaḥ sapakṣaḥ yathā ghaṭa ādiḥ iti
kaḥ vā hetoḥ vipakṣaḥ

original: yatra sādhyābhāvena hetor abhāvo niyamena kathyate [ yathākāśādir iti //
analyzed: yatra sādhya abhāvena hetoḥ abhāvaḥ niyamena kathyate yathā ākāśa ādiḥ iti

original: 7. etad eva ca hetos trirūpavacanaṃ parapratyāyanāya prayujyamānaṃ parārtham anumānam ucyate /
analyzed: etat eva ca hetoḥ trirūpa vacanam para pratyāyanāya prayujyamānam para artham anumānam ucyate

original: yathā anityaḥ śabda iti pakṣavacanaṃ kṛtakatvād iti hetuvacanam /
analyzed: yathā anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti pakṣa vacanam kṛtaka tvāt iti hetu vacanam
ghaṭa ādi vat iti sapakṣa vacanam

h tu
tatra sādharmyeṇa tāvat

original: yat kṛtakaṃ tat sarvam anityaṃ dṛṣṭam /
analyzed: yat kṛtakam tat sarvam anityam dṛṣṭam

kṛtakaḥ ca śabdaḥ iti
vaidharmyeṇa punar

original: asaty anityatve na bhavaty eva kṛtakatvaṃ yathākāśādau /

pratyakṣa ādibhiḥ bādhita tvāt
sa tu pakṣa ābhāsaḥ

original: yathā dhūmādir dharmībuddhimatā hetunā janyata iti sādhye /
analyzed: yathā dhūma ādiḥ dharmī buddhimatā hetunā janyate iti sādhye

original: nānumānaṃ pramāṇam iti parapratipādanāya vacanam uccāryamāṇaṃ parārtham anumānam ity uktatvāt //

original: kiyatkālasthāyino 'pi kṛtakāḥ sarve nityā iti lokapratīteḥ //
analyzed: kiyat kāla sthāyinaḥ pi kṛtakāḥ sarve nityāḥ iti loka pratīteḥ

analyzed: vaiśeṣikasya sāṃkhyam prati vināśī śabdaḥ iti sādhye

h tu

uktāḥ pakṣa ābhāsāḥ

original: 25. tatra yo hetuḥ sapakṣavipakṣayor ubhayatrāsti nāsti vā saṃdihyate /
analyzed: tatra yaḥ hetuḥ sapakṣa vipakṣayoḥ ubhayatra asti na asti vā saṃdihyate

original: 26. ubhayāsiddhaḥ tadyathā śabdasyānityatve sādhye cākṣuṣatvaṃ hetuḥ vādiprativādinor asiddhaḥ //
analyzed: ubhaya asiddhaḥ tat yathā śabdasya anitya tve sādhye cākṣuṣa tvam hetuḥ vādi prativādinoḥ asiddhaḥ

original: 27. cetanās tarava iti sādhye sarvatvagapaharaṇe maraṇād iti hetuḥ prativādino bauddhasyāsiddha iti prativādyasiddhaḥ /
analyzed: cetanāḥ taravaḥ iti sādhye sarva tvac apaharaṇe maraṇāt iti hetuḥ prativādinaḥ bauddhasya asiddhaḥ iti prativādi asiddhaḥ
caitanya ādi nirodhasya bauddhena upagamāt
acetanāḥ sukha ādayaḥ iti sādhye

original: utpattimattvād iti hetuḥ svayaṃ vādinaḥ sāṃkhyasyāsiddhaḥ /
analyzed: utpattimat tvāt iti hetuḥ svayam vādinaḥ sāṃkhyasya asiddhaḥ
iti vādi asiddhaḥ iti

original: 29. vaiśeṣikasya bauddhaṃ prati kṣamādikaṃ dharmī kāryam iti sādhayataḥ pratikṣaṇaṃ sadṛśāparāparotpatter iti svayaṃ vādino 'siddhaḥ /
analyzed: vaiśeṣikasya bauddham prati kṣamā ādikam dharmī kāryam iti sādhayataḥ pratikṣaṇam sadṛśa apara apara utpatteḥ iti svayam siddhaḥ

original: utpattau siddhāyām api pratikṣaṇasadṛśāparāparotpattir ity asiddhaḥ //
analyzed: utpattau siddhāyām api prati kṣaṇa sadṛśa apara apara utpattiḥ iti asiddhaḥ
h tu
pakṣa eka deśa asiddhaḥ yathā

original: na hi sarve vṛkṣā rātrau patrasaṃkocabhājaḥ //
analyzed: na hi sarve vṛkṣāḥ rātrau patra saṃkoca bhājaḥ

original: 31. tathā pṛthivyādikaṃ dharmī buddhimaddhetujanyam iti sādhye kāryatvād iti hetur bauddhaṃ praty asiddhaḥ /
analyzed: tathā pṛthivī ādikam dharmī buddhimat hetu janyam iti sādhye kārya tvāt iti hetuḥ bauddham prati asiddhaḥ

original: pratyakṣānupalambhanibandhano hi kāryakāraṇabhāvo bauddhasya pṛthivyādau na siddhaḥ /
analyzed: pratyakṣa anupalambha nibandhanaḥ hi kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ bauddhasya pṛthivī ādau na siddhaḥ

original: 32. saṃdigdhāsiddho yathā yady ayaṃ dhūmo 'gnir atreti sādhye hetor evāniścayāt //
analyzed: saṃdigdha asiddhaḥ yathā yadi ayam dhūmaḥ gniḥ atra iti sādhye hetoḥ eva aniścayāt

original: iha bahuṣu nikuñjeṣu kvacid ekasmin nikuñje mayūra iti sādhye kekāyikād iti hetuḥ //
analyzed: iha bahuṣu nikuñjeṣu kvacid ekasmin nikuñje mayūraḥ iti sādhye kekāyikāt iti hetuḥ

original: 34. dharmyasiddhāv apy asiddho yathā ātmā dharmī sarvagata iti sādhye sarvatropalabhyamānaguṇatvād iti hetuḥ //

daśā ete siddha saṃjñakāḥ hetvābhāsāḥ
ucyate

original: 37. yathā śabdasya nityatvādike dharme sādhye prameyatvaṃ hetuḥ sapaksvipakṣayoḥ sarvatra vartamānaḥ sādhāraṇānaikāntikaḥ //
analyzed: yathā śabdasya nitya tva ādike dharme sādhye prameya tvam hetuḥ sapak svipakṣayoḥ sarvatra vartamānaḥ sādhāraṇa anaikāntikaḥ

original: 38. tathā śabdasya nityatve śrāvaṇatvaṃ hetuḥ sapakṣavipakṣayor apravartamānāt /
analyzed: tathā śabdasya nitya tve śrāvaṇa tvam hetuḥ sapakṣa vipakṣayoḥ apravartamānāt

tathā śabdasya aprayatna ānantarīyaka tve sādhye nitya tvāt iti hetuḥ

original: aprayatnānantarīyakaḥ śabdasya vidyudākāśādiḥ sapakṣaḥ tatraikadeśe vidyudādau vartate 'nityatvaṃ nākāśādau prayatnāntarīyakaḥ punaḥ sarvo  #
analyzed: aprayatna ānantarīyakaḥ śabdasya vidyut ākāśa ādiḥ sapakṣaḥ tatra eka deśe vidyut ādau vartate nitya tvam na ākāśa ādau prayatna antarīyakaḥ punar sarvaḥ
ghaṭa ādiḥ vipakṣaḥ
tatra sarvatra vartate
h tu

original: 40. tathā prayatnānantarīyakatve śabdasya sādhye 'nityatvaṃ hetuḥ ghaṭādau sarvatra vidyate /

original: tasmād ayaṃ vipakṣaikadeśavṛttiḥ sapakṣavyāpī hetur anaikāntikaḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt ayam vipakṣa eka deśa vṛttiḥ sapakṣa vyāpī hetuḥ anaikāntikaḥ

original: śabde dharmiṇi nityatve sādhye 'mūrtatvād iti hetuḥ /
analyzed: śabde dharmiṇi nitya tve sādhye mūrta tvāt iti hetuḥ

original: tatraikadeśe 'mūrtatvam ākāśe pravartate na paramāṇau mūrtatvāt paramāṇūnam /
analyzed: tatra eka deśe mūrta tvam ākāśe pravartate na paramāṇau mūrta tvāt
ghaṭa sukha ādiḥ anityaḥ vipakṣaḥ
tatra eka deśe sukha ādau vidyate na ghaṭa ādau

original: 42. tathā saṃdigdhavipakṣavyāvṛttikaḥ sapakṣavyāpī hetur anaikāntiko yathā /
analyzed: tathā saṃdigdha vipakṣa vyāvṛttikaḥ sapakṣa vyāpī hetuḥ anaikāntikaḥ yathā

original: kapilādidharmy asarvajña iti sādhye vaktṛtvād iti hetuḥ /
analyzed: kapila ādi dharmī asarvajñaḥ iti sādhye vaktṛ tvāt iti hetuḥ
rathyā puruṣa ādau sapakṣe sti

original: sarvajñasyātīndriyatvād vacanam asti na veti saṃdigdham //
analyzed: sarvajñasya atīndriya tvāt vacanam asti na vā iti saṃdigdham

original: 43. tathā saṃdigdhasapakṣavṛttir vipakṣavyāpl hetur anaikāntiko yathā /
analyzed: tathā saṃdigdha sapakṣa vṛttiḥ hetuḥ anaikāntikaḥ yathā

original: ṛṣabhavardhāmānādidharmī sarvajña iti sādhye kevaliśāstrakaraṇād iti hetuḥ sapakṣe sarvajñe saṃdigdhaḥ /
analyzed: ṛṣabha vardhāmāna ādi dharmī sarvajñaḥ iti sādhye kevali śāstra karaṇāt iti hetuḥ sapakṣe sarvajñe saṃdigdhaḥ
sarvajñasya atīndriya tvāt kevali śāstra karaṇam saṃdigdham
vipakṣe varāhamihira ādau asarvajñe vidyate

original: 44. saṃdigdhānvayavyatirekahetur anaikāntiko yathā sātmakaṃ jīvaccharīraṃ prāṇādimattvād iti hetuḥ /
analyzed: saṃdigdha anvaya vyatireka hetuḥ anaikāntikaḥ yathā sātmakam jīvat śarīram prāṇa ādimat tvāt iti hetuḥ

original: jīvaccharīrasaṃbandhī prāṇādir na sātmake anātmake vā pravṛtto nivṛtto veti niścīyate //
analyzed: jīvat śarīra saṃbandhī prāṇa ādiḥ na sātmake anātmake vā pravṛttaḥ nivṛttaḥ vā iti niścīyate
h tu
tatas kevala anvayī hetuḥ dṛṣṭānta abhāvāt

original: 46. tathā dvitīyo 'pi kevalavyatirekī nedaṃ nirātmakaṃ jīvaccharīram aprāṇādimattvaprasaṅgād iti /
analyzed: tathā dvitīyaḥ pi kevala vyatirekī na idam nirātmakam jīvat śarīram a prāṇa ādimat tva prasaṅgāt iti

original: dṛṣṭāntābhāvād eva nānvayaniścayo nāpi vyatirekaniścaya iti saṃśayahetuḥ //

original: 49. yathā śabdo dharmī nitya iti sādhyo dharmaḥ kṛtakatvād ākāśādivat /
analyzed: yathā śabdaḥ dharmī nityaḥ iti sādhyaḥ dharmaḥ kṛtaka tvāt ākāśa ādi vat

original: ayaṃ hetur ghaṭādau vipakṣa evāsti na sapakṣe //
analyzed: ayam hetuḥ ghaṭa ādau vipakṣe eva asti na sapakṣe

original: 50. tathā śabdo dharmī nitya iti sādhye prayatnānantarīyakatvād iti hetur ākāśādau sapakṣe nāsty eva /
analyzed: tathā śabdaḥ dharmī nityaḥ iti sādhye prayatna ānantarīyaka tvāt iti hetuḥ ākāśa ādau sapakṣe na asti eva
vipakṣa eka dese ghaṭa ādau vidyate na vidyut ādau
etau dvau hetū dharma svarūpa viparīta sādhanau

original: cakṣurādaya iti dharmī parārthā iti sādhyo dharmaḥ saṃghatatvād iti hetuḥ /
analyzed: cakṣuḥ ādayaḥ iti dharmī para arthāḥ iti sādhyaḥ dharmaḥ saṃgha ta tvāt iti hetuḥ

original: ayaṃ tu hetur yathā cakṣurādīnāṃ pārārthyaṃ sādhayati /
analyzed: ayam tu hetuḥ yathā cakṣuḥ ādīnām pārārthyam sādhayati
tathā saṃghāta tvam parasya sādhayati
mañca pīṭha ādīnām saṃghātasya devadatta ādeḥ parasya upakāra darśanāt

original: 52. dharmisvarūpaviparītasādhano yathā pṛthivyādir dharmī buddhimaddhetujanya iti sādhye sāśrayatvād iti hetuḥ /
analyzed: dharmi svarūpa viparīta sādhanaḥ yathā pṛthivī ādiḥ dharmī buddhimat hetu janyaḥ iti sādhye sāśraya tvāt iti hetuḥ
ghaṭa ādi vat iti sapakṣa vacanam

original: ayaṃ hetur yathā buddhimaddhetujanyatvaṃ sādhayati tathā buddhimataḥ kartuḥ sāśrayatvam api sādhayati //
analyzed: ayam hetuḥ yathā buddhimat hetu janya tvam sādhayati tathā buddhimataḥ kartuḥ sāśraya tvam api sādhayati

original: vaiśeṣikasya mīmāṃsakaṃ praty ātmā dharmī cetayata iti sādhye (Htu 267)
analyzed: vaiśeṣikasya mīmāṃsakam prati ātmā dharmī cetayate iti sādhye h tu

original: cetanādhiṣṭhānatvād iti hetur ātmano 'cetanasya yathā caitanyaṃ sādhayati /
analyzed: cetanā adhiṣṭhāna tvāt iti hetuḥ cetanasya yathā caitanyam sādhayati

original: tathā hetur ayam anityatvam api sādhayati /
analyzed: tathā hetuḥ ayam anitya tvam api sādhayati
anitya tvāt vijñānasya
uktāḥ pañca ete viruddha saṃjñakāḥ hetvābhāsāḥ

original: 55. viruddhāvyabhicārī nāma na kaścid dhetudoṣo 'stīti na tasyodāharaṇaṃ yuktam /
analyzed: viruddhāvyabhicārī nāma na kaścid hetu doṣaḥ sti iti na tasya udāharaṇam yuktam

original: yat sarvadeśāvasthitaiḥ svayaṃ ca svasaṃbandhibhir yugapad abhisaṃbadhyate tat sarvagatam /
analyzed: yat sarva deśa avasthitaiḥ svayam ca sva saṃbandhibhiḥ yugapad abhisaṃbadhyate tat sarvagatam

original: abhisaṃbadhyate ca sarvadeśāvasthitaiḥ svasaṃbandhibhir yugapat sāmānyam iti pailukasya svabhāvahetuprayogaḥ / /
analyzed: abhisaṃbadhyate ca sarva deśa avasthitaiḥ sva saṃbandhibhiḥ yugapad sāmānyam iti pailukasya svabhāva hetu prayogaḥ
dvitīyaḥ pi prayogaḥ paiṭharasya

original: yad upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptaṃ yatra nopalabhyate na tatrāsti /
analyzed: yat upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptam yatra na upalabhyate na tatra asti
tat yathā kvacid a vidyamānaḥ ghaṭaḥ
na upalabhyate ca upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptam sāmānyam vyakti antarāleṣu iti

original: anupalambho hetuḥ pūrvoktaś ca svabhāvaḥ parasparaṃ bādhayataḥ /
analyzed: anupalambhaḥ hetuḥ pūrva uktaḥ ca svabhāvaḥ parasparam bādhayataḥ
saṃśaya jananāt

original: 56. na sapakṣād anyo dṛṣṭānto nāma kaścid iti sapakṣa eva sādharmyadṛṣṭāntaḥ //
analyzed: na sapakṣāt anyaḥ dṛṣṭāntaḥ nāma kaścid iti sapakṣaḥ eva sādharmya dṛṣṭāntaḥ
tatra dṛṣṭānta ābhāsaḥ kīdṛśaḥ

nityaḥ śabdaḥ mūrta tvāt karma vat
sādhya vikalaḥ karmaṇaḥ nitya tvāt

sādhana vikalaḥ paramāṇūnām mūrta tvāt

original: (Htu 268) tatra dṛṣṭānte rathyāpuruṣe rāgādimattvaṃ saṃdigdhaḥ paracetovṛttīnāṃ duranvayatvāt //

original: kaścit puruṣo maraṇadharma iti sādhye rāgādimattvād iti hetuḥ /

original: 63. saṃdigdhobhayadharmā dṛṣṭāntābhāso yathā kaścit puruṣo dharmī asarvajña iti sādhye rāgādimattvād iti hetuḥ /

gambhīra dhvanavataḥ pi meghasya vṛṣṭi vighāta saṃbhavāt

original: 105. yathopari vṛṣṭo devo nadīpūradarśanāt bandhabhaṅgādināpi nadīpūrasya darśaṇāt //
analyzed: yathā upari vṛṣṭaḥ devaḥ nadī pūra darśanāt bandha bhaṅga ādinā api nadī pūrasya darśaṇāt

original: 106. yathā pakvā ete taṇḍulā ekasthālyantargatatvād dṛṣṭataṇḍulavat //
analyzed: yathā pakvāḥ ete taṇḍulāḥ eka sthālī antargata tvāt dṛṣṭa taṇḍula vat
pakvāni etāni phalāni eka śākhā prabandhāt
upayukta phala vat

original: atra bhūyo darśane 'pi sādhyasādhanayor vyabhicārasaṃbhava eva //
analyzed: atra bhūyas darśane pi sādhya sādhanayoḥ vyabhicāra saṃbhavaḥ eva

original: 108. yathā yat pārthivaṃ tat sarvaṃ lohalekhyaṃ dṛṣṭam /
analyzed: yathā yat pārthivam tat sarvam loha lekhyam dṛṣṭam
yathā kāṣṭha ādi
vajram api pārthivam
yaḥ prāṇī sa sarvaḥ sagrīvaḥ
yathā karabha ādiḥ kulīraḥ pi prāṇī

original: 110. yathā yad dravad dravyam ārdrakṛt tad dṛṣṭaṃ yathodakaṃ /
analyzed: yathā yat dravat dravyam ārdra kṛt tat dṛṣṭam yathā udakam
pāradam api dravat dravyam iti
evam anye pi anumāna ābhāsāḥ draṣṭavyāḥ iti
hetutattva upadeśaḥ samāptaḥ
kṛtiḥ iyam paṇḍita rāja jitāri pādānām
